dmca.title: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2005 3:47 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

                                        June 28, 2005


BY EMAIL: copyright@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com AND FIRST CLASS MAIL
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 N. Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

RE:  ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

To ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.

The www.allfakes.com website offers counterfeit and infringing Rolex watches
for sale.  Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks is likely to cause
confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark infringement and
dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in violation of both
federal and state laws. 

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note
the following: 

1.        Signature of the undersigned set forth below.

2.        www.allfakes.com is offering for sale counterfeit Rolex merchandise
and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit merchandise is prohibited
by federal law (15 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP (for Rolex Watch USA, INC.)
